remarks: Closure of a trace-preserving endomorphism.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-2013.)
statement:
tendof.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendof.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendof.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendocl $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ S e. E /\ F e. T ) -> ( S ` F ) e. T ) $.
